description.diamond-pearl:
The user envelops
itself in a veil made
of water. It regains
some HP on every
turn.

effect.full:
Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP at the end of each turn.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.shortEffect: Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP each turn.
